/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees and shrubs on both sides, their green hues contrasting beautifully with the clear blue sky above. The sun casts a warm glow on the scene, illuminating the landscape and highlighting the textures of the trees and shrubs. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with the trees and shrubs neatly lining the street, leading the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The absence of people or vehicles adds to the tranquility of the scene. The image is a testament to the harmonious coexistence of nature and urban development in Beijing.
